titleNullable: NIH Chest X-rays TFREC256 study may 2020
subtitleNullable: Images used in the study from NP Journal, in TFREC format
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Original images from NIH Chest X Rays Dataset 18

In the study from https://www.nature.com/articles/s41746-020-0273-z a subset of images has been used.
I have packed those files in TFREC format.

### Content
Original images from NIH Chest X Rays Dataset 18
Every record contains:
* image
* image_name
* label

Update (version2, 12/12/2020): ti support K-fold CV I have also packed together train and validation images in train_validXX.tfrec files.
Other files (train, valid, test are the same)

### Acknowledgements

@article{tang2020automated,
    title={Automated abnormality classification of chest radiographs using deep convolutional neural networks},
    author={Tang, Yu-Xing and Tang, You-Bao and Peng, Yifan and Yan, Ke and Bagheri, Mohammadhadi and Redd, Bernadette A and Brandon, Catherine J and Lu, Zhiyong and Han, Mei and Xiao, Jing and Summers, Ronald M},
    journal= {npj Digital Medicine},
    volume={3},
    number={1},
    pages={1--8},
    year={2020},
    publisher={Nature Publishing Group}
}


### Inspiration

Are we able to reproduce results seen in  https://www.nature.com/articles/s41746-020-0273-z ?
